Witch2.intro: When the hurly-burly’s done, when the battle’s lost and won.

Witch1_response1.name: First Witch
Witch1_response1.text: The war for the throne rages on, but soon it will be over.

Witch1_response2.name: First Witch
Witch1_response2.text: Indeed, the storm brews in our favor.

Witch3.name: Third Witch
Witch3.intro: That will be ere the set of sun.

Witch1_response3.name: First Witch
Witch1_response3.text: Upon the heath, as the fates decree.

finale.text: Fair is foul, and foul is fair; Hover through the fog and filthy air.
